sentences.english: From the viewpoint of microscopic and phenomenological analyses, a rubber friction theoretical model was developed.
sentences.chinese: 由微觀和唯象分析建立了橡膠粘附摩擦的理論模型。

sentences.english: In hadron levels the hadronic masses can be introduced phenomenologically.
sentences.chinese: 強子層次上強子的質量可以唯象的引入。

sentences.english: A phenomenological anisotropic domain rotation model has been proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了唯象的各向異性磁疇旋轉模型。

sentences.english: This method can be easily generalized to relativistically phenomenological dynamical equation.
sentences.chinese: 這一方法易於推廣到相對論性唯象動力學方程。

sentences.english: Based on the phenomenon logic theory, a continuum assumption method for multiphase material is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 用唯象方法，建立了多相物體的連續介質假設方法。

sentences.english: A Phenomenological Theory of Cosmic Inflation.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙暴脹理論的唯象描述。

sentences.english: The validity of the general phenomenological boundary condition is elucidated.
sentences.chinese: 闡明瞭等效地使用唯象普遍邊界條件的可能性。

sentences.english: From the viewpoint of microscopic and phenomenological analyses, rubber friction theoretical model was developed.
sentences.chinese: 由微觀和唯象分析建立了橡膠粘附摩擦的理論模型。

sentences.english: A theoretical model of rubber adhesion friction has been developed based on the microscopic and phenomenological analysis.
sentences.chinese: 由微觀和唯象分析建立了橡膠粘附摩擦的理論模型。

sentences.english: Phenomenological analysis of mass transport through Stratum Corneum.
sentences.chinese: 物質經角質層轉運的唯象分析。

pinyin: zi4 fa1 dui4 chen4 po4 que1
liang4 zi3 se4 dong4 li4 xue2
